We believe that people make it happen and with us you are empowered to act. Your ideas can make a real difference and contribute to the quality of life for people everywhere.

job_title: Automated Data Science and Data Wrangling
job_summary:
The Declarative Languages and Artificial Intelligence (DTAI) Section of the Department of Computer Science of the KU Leuven is one of the leading research groups for artificial intelligence, machine learning and data science. It is internationally renowned for its pioneering work the integration of learning and reasoning, in domains such as statistical relational and neural-symbolic AI, probabilistic and inductive programming, logical and relational learning and their applications. In addition to fundamental research, the DTAI group applies the developed techniques to concrete cases situated in data science, sensors, sports analytics, combinatorial optimisation, robot manipulation and navigation, natural language processing, smart electronics, computer vision, etc. For these applications, DTAI often cooperates with other groups and companies from strategically chosen research areas.
  


  Website unit 
 

Responsibilities


    Within DTAI, the group of prof. Luc De Raedt has an opening for a scientific collaborator in the area of automated data science. More specifically, the scientist will work on automated data wrangling and inductive programming. The problem to be tackled is sketched below.
    


     Data Science tools assume that the data is in an appropriate shape; a single table in which all values are appropriately formatted. This assumption is often violated in practice, as a lot of data is stored in semi-structured formats, such as spreadsheets, and are formatted for human readability rather than for consumption by algorithms. Getting this data into a suitable shape is therefore time consuming, even for experienced data scientists, with up to 80% of time spent on data preparation tasks like restructuring tables and formatting values. Existing tools aimed at reducing the effort to transform various data, such as spreadsheets, into appropriate formats, however, make the strong assumption that users already know exactly what the final data should look like, both in terms of layout and formatting. The barrier for non-experts to get started with analysis thus remains high, and even experts are still spending most of their time on the preparation steps when presented with ill-formatted data. As part of the ERC Advanced Grant SYNTH project, the team of professor Luc De Raedt has already shown that predictive approaches are promising for suggesting effective layouts and formats for tables and values, respectively. The goal of this project is to leverage research prototypes with functionality required for practical use, an effort guided by a number of use cases, and to have all components in place for building a minimal viable product and pursue a spin-off based on this technology. With our solution, we thus aim to close the gap between having access to data, and quickly being able to generate value from this data, by allowing users to focus on its content, rather than on its structure and format.
   



Profile



The ideal candidate has a Master or PhD in Computer Science or Artificial Intelligence. Experience that related to the topic of the project is a plus.



 Candidates must have excellent programming skills, be proficient in oral and written English, possess excellent communication skills, multi-tasking skills, and be team-oriented, proactive and result driven. The scientist will work on research projects that involve frequent interactions with both internal and external researchers.



 The positions can start immediately, and positions will be filled as soon as suitable candidates are found. Interested candidates should send their CV, their transcripts, contact information of 2 or 3 referees, and a motivation letter using the KU Leuven system. The motivation letter should clearly outline the interests in automated data science, as well as past experience in the area.





Offer



A position as scientific collaborator for a duration of one year (extendible with one year).
 A stimulating environment at Europe's most innovative university, in a well-equipped, experienced and internationally oriented research unit.
 The research will be based at the Department of Computer Science at the Arenberg Campus in Heverlee (close to the center of Leuven).









Interested?

   For more information please contact Prof. dr. Luc De Raedt, tel.: 
   +32 16 32 78 34, mail: luc.deraedt@kuleuven.be or Mr. Wannes Meert, tel.: +32 16 37 25 66, mail: wannes.meert@kuleuven.be.
  


  You can apply for this job no later than October 01, 2022 via the online application tool 
 


   KU Leuven seeks to foster an environment where all talents can flourish, regardless of gender, age, cultural background, nationality or impairments. If you have any questions relating to accessibility or support, please contact us at diversiteit.HR@kuleuven.be.

Wat hebben wij jou te bieden?

VITO is an independent Flemish research organisation in the area of cleantech and sustainable development.At VITO, our aim is a society where sustainability is the norm. We are working on global projects to promote the transition to sustainability. We create innovative technological solutions and actively share our knowledge with businesses and government bodies.

 You will be member of a team that focuses on supply chain optimization. The team provides supply chain decision support as a service towards public and private clients, via research projects as well as commercial consultancy. To support this activity the team developed MooV, our proprietary linear programming optimization model. More on: https://moov.vito.be/en 
As data scientist you will extend, improve and apply MooV in close collaboration with our fellow senior developer.

You translate client supply chain optimization requirements into mathematical logic. 
You program this logic into the MooV model tailoring it to meet the client’s requirements.
 You test and validate the model’s results in relation to the client’s requirements.
 You report the results in a (non-technical) decision support format.

 Our team is embedded in VITO with the vision to accelerate the transition to a more sustainable world. As a MooV team we believe supply chain optimization is an essential part to make that happen. Interested? Check below if you match the profile that we are looking for this position.

 You have a Master degree in a mathematical, scientific (chemie/ fysica) or engineering field with focus on operations research algorithms. A PhD in this, or in another quantitative field, is preferred. 
You have expertise in linear programming using Python or using another programming language (e.g. R, MATLAB, …). Preferably in network and supply chain analysis. Having GIS expertise is an asset.
 You have knowledge of related mathematical optimization techniques and heuristics. 
You have strong and creative mathematical problem-solving capabilities.
 You can bring theoretical content and results to a client-friendly communication level 
You can work autonomously supported by a team.
 You are fluent in Dutch and English


 Our Offer

 A temporary contract with duration of up to 2 years with a possibility for prolongation.
 A range of benefits including allowances, insurances, adjustable holiday package and flexible working hours and workplace.
 Innovation is our core asset, therefore it goes without saying that we give our employees the opportunity to undertake additional training and keep up to date in their field of expertise.
 The chance to be part of an organisation with an international reputation, known for its advanced technological research and scientific consultancy.
 The possibility to actively contribute towards sustainable developments at local, national and global level.

Do you want to join one of the pioneers in sustainability?
 Greenomy is expanding, join our mission in accelerating the green transition!
 Greenomy is a fast-growing greentech scale-up that built an advanced SaaS regulatory reporting platform for companies and financial institutions . Our mission is to accelerate the global transition to a sustainable economy. We want to empower companies and financial services to measure, analyse, plan and execute their sustainability objectives while enabling them to efficiently and effectively comply with regulations. Our platform’s outcome and mission will enable the redirection of funds towards sustainable activities, speeding up the transition to a carbon neutral economy in line with the EU Green Deal.
 In order to sustain our rapid growth and scale our operations to the next level, we are looking for a highly motivated NLP Data Scientist to join our team.
 Our team:
 An international, diverse and multicultural team of over 40 highly passionate Greenomers, comprising highly skilled individuals in sustainable reporting, technology, regulatory, and project management and of over 12 different nationalities from technology, consulting and banking law firms, European institutions , start-ups, Masters, PhDs and MBAs from top universities.
 Since our launch in 2020 we have partnered with major industry leaders, are backed by serious investors (Euroclear) and we are working with the most reputable sustainability experts. Our headquarters are based in Brussels, in addition we have a solid remote team located in over 20 countries across the globe.
 Some of our values, who make us who we are: We have a growth mindset, are team spirited, purpose driven with a strong passion for learning.
 Awards:
 We are proud of the following awards our team achieved since our launch in 2020 which show the innovativeness of our solutions: European Discovery Fintech Startup 2021, International Laureate of the Fintech for Tomorrow Challenge 2020, one of the 100 most innovative fintechs in the world by FinTech Abu Dhabi 2021; first prize in the "Data Collection, Verification and Sharing" category at the G20 TechSprint 2021, the LHoFT - Luxembourg House of Financial Technology’s acceleration program Catapult Kickstarter 2021. In the UK, we have been selected as one of ten firms to participate in the FCA GreenTech Regulatory Sandbox.
 Roles & Responsibilities:

 Automate manual user actions, for instance by extracting data points from unstructured documents with OCR & NLP
 Manage data related to energy efficiency measures and renewable energy procurement, carbon reporting, GHG emission protocols, etc.
 Conduct research and provide recommendations to support our clients' sustainability transition on topics related to climate change mitigation/adaptation, etc.

Data Scientist - Energy in Buildings
 EnergyVille (https://www.energyville.be/) is a collaboration between the Belgian research partners VITO, KU Leuven, imec and UHasselt in the field of renewable energy and intelligent energy systems. The District Energy Modeling team within VITO/EnergyVille develops models, algorithms and software for planning, monitoring and controlling energy consumption and production at building and district level. For our District Energy Modeling team we're looking for you as motivated and experienced Data Scientist.

 Some of your daily activities:

 You are involved in applied research projects and in contract-based research, i.e. directly for customers. These customers are energy consultants, energy service providers, banks, energy suppliers, contractors/installers, etc.
 Together with a team of colleagues you are responsible for the design of concepts for data capture and data handling for the toolchain. Starting from the conceived concept you will work together with the internal deployment team for the actual development of the solution and for client deployment of the algorithms and software (API, cloud, edge based).
 You invent solutions for processing large flows of real-time data, you identify data gaps and you are involved in processing the data into scientific insights. 
 You take the lead internally for improving the IT architecture of our solutions. You consult with the energy researchers involved, other data scientists, IT professionals, and with the project team on the side of our partners and customers. While doing this, you always aim for a customer-centric and qualitative service.

 Interested to contribute? Read on!
 #ITIndeed

 You hold a Master's degree in a relevant field (industrial engineer, civil engineer computer science, master's degree in computer science).
 You have at least 3 years of relevant work experience.
 You have experience in programming (Ruby, Python), software/algorithms product development, deployment concept technologies and version control. You are aware of the best practices in data management (e.g. in terms of data governance, data security, integrity, etc.), data architecture design and development.
 You have knowledge of/experience with cloud solutions and certificates (e.g. Microsoft Azure, Amazon AWS), Docker and orchestration platforms, relational databases (SQL, postgreSQL) and database management.
 You are entrepreneurial, proactive and constantly looking for improvement opportunities in the design of our databases, algorithms and IT architecture.
 You are eager to take the lead for the realization of your concept to an operational solution. You always do this in consultation with the energy researchers, data scientists and the IT application development team.
 Interest/affinity with scientific research (energy, data science) is an added value.

 Offer

 If you're tired of the frequent commute, you've come to the right place. We work 'activity based', our activities bring us to our location. Our EnergyVille office is in Genk, here we meet at least once a week. Part-time work from home, our headquarter in Mol, or working from a satellite office in Antwerp-Berchem, Ghent or Ostend is possible.
 A competitive salary with a range of benefits including allowances, insurances, and a modular vacation package.
 Innovation is our asset, so it goes without saying that we offer our employees the opportunity to follow additional training courses and stay up to date in their field of expertise. You always get the opportunity to broaden your knowledge on for example energy monitoring.
 You will be part of an organization with an international reputation, known for its advanced technological research and scientific consultancy.
 With us, you will contribute directly to sustainable developments at local, national, and global level through your innovative applications. You provide an answer to today’s societal challenges.
 Moreover, at VITO we attach great importance to work-life balance. We do this by being flexible, depending on your specific needs.

Company Description
  Sia Partners is a specialist Management Consulting firm in 1999 and has grown into a global firm with approximately 2200 employees and annual revenue exceeding $400m. Our culture is strongly orientated towards high-quality expertise and delivering excellent results and outcomes for our clients, which include a wide range of multinational companies. Our global presence and our expertise in more than 30 sectors and services allows us to accompany clients worldwide. Using innovative technologies such as our own in-house apps, social networks, and digital tools, we provide a truly integrated global service.
 Through Consulting for Good, we put our expertise at the service of our clients' climate objectives and make sustainable development a performance lever for our clients. Our portfolio of offerings is cross-sectors, +60 wide consulting offers and generate 15% of revenues.



 Job Description
  As a consultant in Data Science, you will be involved in transformation projects at our clients. You will execute project assignments in modelling and digital transformation (business/IT analysis and partial coding) environments with a good deal of business perspectives:

 Machine learning, AI and statistics: developing predictive models of decision making (supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms, econometrics, forecasting, quantitative diagnosis,...)
 Operational research : assistance in the design and implementation of constraint optimization solutions and simulation models
 Big Data : Algorithmic knowledge for large and unstructured data processing

 You will get the opportunity to actively contribute to Sia Partners’ internal activities:

 Development and reinforcement of our offer, by understanding and interpreting data science innovation and challenges
 Business development, by contributing to need definition and participating in our commercial initiatives

 Equipped with the entrepreneurial fibre, you are ready to cooperate in a fast growing company.

 In return, you can expect:

 An international company that gives importance to diversity, inclusion, employee well-being and corporate social responsibilities actions.

 A competitive salary with great advantages, like mobility budget, hospital insurance, performance -related bonus,...

 Outstanding team player with great interpersonal and communication skills

 Dynamic, result oriented, rigorous and committed

 Bij AE - Architects for business en ICT draait alles rond uitdagende projecten, organisaties én mensen in een digitale wereld. Mensen zoals jou, en mensen bij onze klanten. Onze experts vind je in uiteenlopende solutions zoals business architectuur, software architectuur & development, information management, analytics, integration,… .  Bij AE geef je mee vorm aan strategische projecten op het raakvlak van business, technologie (IT), en organisatiestructuur. Je helpt onze klanten om sterker te staan in de digitale wereld. AE is een Belgische, autonome en groeiende organisatie die 360 medewerkers telt en waar je mee het verschil maakt. Onze kantoren vind je in Gent (Ghelamco), Leuven of Hasselt. Je mag rekenen op een consultancy speler mét een sterke organisatiecultuur en toffe teamdynamiek. AE is een ‘Best Employer in Belgium 2020’ met het Great Place To Work- certificaat en dat merk je.
  


 Disclaimer: Herken je je in deze vacature, of wil je in deze richting groeien? Onze data community heeft plaats voor jou!
  



    Data staan centraal in de digitale transformaties die onze klanten doormaken. Je belandt bij AE in een 
   informele bedrijfscultuur waar een 
   gezellig pintje én een 
   sterke kenniswerking rond data hand in hand gaan. Wil je uitgedaagd worden door en bijleren van straffe collega’s binnen onze 
   data community? Top. Wil je ook jouw eigen expertise delen? Nog beter.
  



 Als data scientist leef je je uit 
   in zeer uiteenlopende domeinen. Customer insights, optimalisatie van productieprocessen, document automation, logistiek of de optimalisatie van supply chain processen zijn maar enkele voorbeelden. Je avontuur begint bij de business uitdagingen van de klant. Je vertrekt vanuit de specifieke noden van de klant en werkt een oplossing uit waarin complexe data centraal staan.
  



    Aan de hand van 
   brainstorm technieken, design thinking én de expertise van je collega’s bepaal je in welke data toegevoegde waarde zit en hoe je die naar boven kan halen.
  



    Je zet 
   Artificiële Intelligentie en Machine Learning technologieën in. Op basis van slimme combinaties van verschillende algoritmes, SaaS oplossingen en cloud toepassingen haal je inzichten uit de data. Je zet in op een 
   combinatie van open source, third-party oplossingen en zelf ontwikkelde algoritmes en modellen.




    De volgende stap? Dat is dan de industrialisatie en de integratie van je oplossing in toepassingen bij onze klanten zodat de data een competitief voordeel worden.

We are looking for a passionate Junior Data Scientist, with 0-2 years of experience, to join our second-stage rocket ship!  As a data scientist, you are at the origin of our next product features. Our projects cover most of the standard spectrum of data science from classifiers and regressors on tabular data, to natural language processing, outliers detection in time series, or even computer vision.  You love food!

 Organizing internal team hackathons to tackle hard problems

diversificatie
innovatie
export


 Innoveren doen we niet in één specialisme, maar als totaalbedrijf in meerdere disciplines: water, energie, mobiliteit, restauratie, bouwkunde, speciale technieken en andere gespecialiseerde bouwtechnieken.  De Denys Group, een veelgevraagde partner voor de meest complexe bouwprojecten en infrastructuurwerken.



Functiebeschrijving
 Als Data & Process Analyst ondersteun je het Technical & Logistical Department in verbeter-initiatieven. Je proces-denken en data gedreven analyses leggen de basis voor verandering. Daarnaast krijg je een aantal afgelijnde projecten toegewezen, waarbij je project management skills kunt leren en oefenen. Vanaf 2023 speel je ook een actieve rol bij een ERP implementatie in onze firma.


Deze rol omvat volgende verantwoordelijkheden:

Data Analyse 
   
Je wordt de specialist van het departement voor alles dat te maken heeft met data, analyses en rapporten.
Je helpt je collega’s om te leren informatie uit data te halen.
Jouw analyses brengen de prioriteiten qua verbeter-initiatieven naar boven.

Proces Analyse 
   
Je leert alle bestaande processen kennen in het departement, en helpt deze inpassen in het nieuwe ERP pakket.
Je bent in staat om de zin en onzin van iedere proces-stap boven water te krijgen.
Uiteindelijk definieer je zinvolle KPI’s per proces
Met veel trots giet je de ‘best-practice’ processen in procedure-documenten.

Project Management 
   
Samen met het Indoor Warehouse Team kopieer je de bestaande processen naar een extra stuk warehouse.
Na het afwerken van bovenstaande project, krijg je een nieuw project toegewezen.



Profiel


Je bent een ambitieuze starter met een master binnen een analytische richting (Master ingenieurswetenschappen – Master economische wetenschappen, Master Handelswetenschappen) of gelijkwaardig door ervaring.
Je bent stipt, nauwkeurig en ordelijk en streeft ernaar steeds correct werk op te leveren.
Je bent een analyticus en kan snel tot een synthese komen. Je weet grotere hoeveelheden aan data te verwerken en inzichtelijk te maken.
Je bent een geboren organisator en weet prioriteiten in te schatten.
Je bent leergierig, denkt mee en levert een actieve teambijdrage
Je beheerst vlot het Nederlands en Engels en kan je daarnaast goed uitdrukken in het Frans.


Wij bieden


Een uitdagende job binnen een sterk groeiende onderneming.
Een professionele omgeving waar samenwerking centraal staat.
Een salarispakket dat jouw prestaties en ervaring optimaal beloont.


Contact

 Solliciteer nu via onze website: www.denys.com / jobs

job_title: Data Analyst bij Federale Interne Auditdienst (m/v/x)
job_summary:
Let’s talk about the job:  Ben je al enkele jaren werkzaam als statutair medewerker binnen de federale overheid? Ben je klaar om jouw loopbaan een nieuwe wending te geven? Jouw expertise te delen en zo te helpen bouwen aan de toekomst van de federale overheid? Dan ben jij de persoon die wij, de Federale Interne Auditdienst, zoeken!  Of je nu enthousiast bent om alle organisaties van de federale overheid beter te leren kennen of het management wil ondersteunen in het verbeteren van hun werking. Bij de FIA zijn we op zoek naar motivatie, leergierigheid en enthousiasme.
 Jouw opdracht? Ter ondersteuning van de auditopdrachten identificeer je relevante gegevens in de verschillende FOD-databanken en exploiteert deze. Je voert eventueel nuttige analyses uit en presenteert de resultaten aan het management.

Finance 
   



    LIEGE-SAINT LAURENT(BEL) 
   



    Belgique 
   


Description du poste

    En tant que 
    Financial Process & Data Analyst (h/f), vous faites partie du Département Finance et vous rapportez au Financial Reporting, Taxes & Treasury Manager. Vous rejoignez une équipe composée de 3 Financial Analysts.
     Concrètement, vos responsabilités sont les suivantes :
    
 En collaboration étroite avec les équipes Contrôle de Gestion, BI et IT, assurer le développement, l’amélioration continue ainsi que la maintenance des outils et processus permettant le reporting financier et le contrôle de gestion des activités de l’entreprise, notamment :


 Le calcul d’indicateurs de performance (marges, coûts, …) ;
 Le calcul des marges futures par type de produits, canal d’acquisition (…) ;
 L’assistance dans le développement des modèles budgétaire et de prévision ;


 Etablir et suivre la réalisation des feuilles de route relatives aux projets du département Finance ;
 Assurer la disponibilité et l’interaction avec les capacités de développement (BI et IT) nécessaires à la réalisation de vos projets.




Profil recherché


Vous êtes détenteur d’un Master en Ingénieur de Gestion ou en Sciences de Gestion.
 Vous avez des compétences analytiques développées et vous avez une très bonne compréhension des outils BI ainsi qu’une expérience en modélisation de processus financiers.
 Vous êtes capable de rapidement comprendre différents modèles de données.
 Vous avez une première expérience en gestion de projet.
 Vous avez une connaissance avancée d’Excel.
 Vous avez des compétences avancées en langage SQL et une bonne compréhension des Data Model.
 Vous êtes capable de comprendre et traduire différents processus financiers en spécifications de développement.
 L’autonomie, le sens de l’initiative et de la communication, la proactivité et l’esprit de synthèse sont des traits qui vous caractérisent.
 Sont de sérieux atouts :
      
 Une première approche du secteur de l’énergie ;
 La maitrise du logiciel QlikSense ;
 La maitrise des outils JIRA.





Réfèrence

    56726BR
   


Métier

    Middle/Back Office Financier 
   


Région, département, localité

    Région wallonne 
   


Localisation (Précisions/Mots-clés)

    Liège

    CDI

Société Employeur

Branche

A propos de nous/Profil de l'entreprise

TotalEnergies est une compagnie multi-énergies mondiale de production et de fourniture d’énergies : pétrole et biocarburants, gaz naturel et gaz verts, renouvelables et électricité. Ses 105 000 collaborateurs s'engagent pour une énergie toujours plus abordable, propre, fiable et accessible au plus grand nombre. Présent dans plus de 130 pays, TotalEnergies inscrit le développement durable dans toutes ses dimensions au cœur de ses projets et opérations pour contribuer au bien-être des populations.

Bedrijfsomschrijving
 RMB est la 2e plus grande régie publicitaire du sud du pays.
 RMB commercialise, auprès des annonceurs et des agences média, les espaces vidéo, audio et digitaux d’un éventail de marques complémentaires : chaînes TV, chaînes radio, sites ou plateformes digitales de la RTBF, de NRJ, de Mediawan (AB3 & ABXPLORE), de LN24 et de DH Radio. RMB gère également l’inventaire vidéo des sites d’IPM Advertising et de Sellbranch. RMB propose des solutions publicitaires différenciées au travers de la grande diversité des marque représentées, ainsi que des projets créatifs via son équipe F.L.A.S.H. et des offres « data » via son équipe VIBE.
 Nos valeurs d’entreprise sont : innover, conquérir, inspirer et s’engager.
 
Functieomschrijving
 Sous la supervision du Head of Data & Insights, tu collaboreras à la gestion, à l’exploitation et à la valorisation des données liées au portefeuille de RMB et de ses partenaires.
 Tu aideras à la prise de décisions business, et à la maximisation du R.O.I.
 Responsabilités:

Acquérir une vue d’ensemble des données disponibles en interne et en externe
Récolter, structurer et modéliser les données chiffrées, quelle qu'en soit la source
Dégager les principales tendances de consommation media et communiquer des insights stratégiques sur les médias/marques en régie
Transformer les données en informations parlantes et exploitables
Mettre en place des outils d’aide à la prise de décision et les promouvoir en interne

 Préparer les données dans l'outil de Dataviz PowerBI: structure et modélisation

Comprendre et challenger les besoins business, émettre des recommandations
Inspirer et guider les clients internes et externes
Participer à des projets d’entreprise transversaux, dont les projets d’innovation digitale

 Profil:

Tu disposes d’une formation supérieure en marketing ou à orientation économique
Tu as une expérience de minimum 2 ans en analyses marketing quantitatives (validation, exploitation, synthétisation de données) dans le marché média-publicitaire
Tu comprends les business models digitaux et suis de près les tendances du marché publicitaire
Tu as une expérience dans l'usage des outils de visualisation, dont PowerBI, notamment la préparation des données.
La maîtrise de Google Analytics et de l'environnement Azure est un plus
Tu es bilingue français-anglais (avec capacité rédactionnelle), le néerlandais étant un plus
Tu es structuré, rigoureux
Tu as un don pour faire parler les chiffres et tu es pédagogue
Tu es curieux, enthousiaste, bon communicateur, collaboratif et tu as le sens de l’initiative

Who are we?

 IBA is a listed company, headquartered in Belgium, and employs 1500 people across the globe mobilizing their skills and passion to Protect, Enhance and Save lives
  We develop, manufacture and support innovative equipment and software solutions for diagnostic, cancer treatment, and industrial applications.
  Innovating for life since more than 30 years, IBA has opened new ways to diagnose and fight cancer and become the worldwide technology leader in the field of Proton Therapy, which is today the most advanced technologies treatment against cancer. Our core particle accelerators knowledge is unparalleled, with 100,000 patients treated on our proton therapy solutions and over 550 accelerators in operation globally.
 

One Mission, 4 business lines

 IBA ‘s world class expertise lies in the development of:
  next generation Proton Therapy technologies
  Radiopharmaceuticals providing oncology care providers with premium quality services and equipment
  Dosimetry advanced solutions for Quality Assurance of medical equipment and increased patient safety
  particle accelerators for the Industrial and medical world.
 
 Our 4 business lines are employing more than 1,500 passionate professionals worldwide dedicated to our Mission: Protect, Enhance and Save lives.
 

Sustainability commitment

 As a company, we are focused on striking the right balance between our stakeholders: increasing our market share and the return for our shareholders, improving the quality of life of our customers, patients and employees, and contributing to the well-being of our society, while also maintaining and restoring our planet’s health.
 
 “Since 2021, IBA is recognized as a certified B Corporation (or B Corp). B Corps are companies that promote ‘business as a force for good’, balancing profit and purpose. They meet the highest standards of social and environmental performance, public transparency, and legal accountability.”
 
 Check out our webpage sustainability to find out more!
 

Join us

 At IBA we dare to develop innovative solutions pushing back the limits of technology. We achieved worldwide recognition in our field by supplying the world's top oncologists with the most precise, cancer-defeating, technologies.
 
 If you are passionate, cause-driven, you can make this quest yours by joining our dedicated colleagues and give your career a new meaning.
 
General information

Very flexible teleworking policy: you work 2-3 days a week from home if you wish
Many possibilities of evolution, as much in Belgium as internationally if you want to evolve in the coming years towards other responsibilities
Possibility to evolve as an expert in the same way as a manager (same salary policy according to your choice)

Why is this a technically interesting opportunity?

As part of an active player on implementing new Data Warehouse version (BW4HANA) and reporting tool (SAC, Power Bi) at IBA, you will be also part of future decision regarding governance, best practices for creating a robust landscape
You will be part of a team that uses various technologies, that makes your job very interesting, not boring, and allow you to have a large scale of knowledge
Personal & team growth – we grow individuals providing coaching, learning & training opportunities both within IBA and leveraging external expertise where needed

What about the team ?

"We are a highly motivated data analytics team who mix Microsoft and SAP technologies having the same goal providing best quality data and reporting or self-service for business users.

Our team is very helpful and allow each other to grow as well technically speaking than in our work-life balance (lunch together, sport during lunch time, afterworks,...)" Sebastien D.W. - Team member


Responsabilities

 As a data analyst in the Data Factory team, you will work alongside data analysts/scientists and data engineers to 
 support IBA’s change towards a data-driven company. We want to empower employees with data to help them become more efficient and make informed decisions. We are therefore working on 
 two pillars: (1) 
 enabling self-service analytics by making data available in a state-of-the-art data warehouse for reporting; and (2) 
 improving our operations with advanced analytics (incl. AI and machine learning).
 
 SAP is a critical source of data at IBA but so far, SAP data was only available to experts with strong knowledge of SAP solutions. As we are upgrading our capabilities with SAP (migrating SAP BW 7.5 to SAP BW/4HANA), we want to democratize the access to SAP and increase business impact.
  The data analyst will be the interface between business stakeholders and data engineers. He/she will capture needs related to logistics, project, finance and HR, understand the data structure in SAP and translate these needs into development requirements for our data engineers. In addition, he/she will develop an expertise with Power BI application and support report creators who need to use SAP data.
 
As a Data Analyst with focus on SAP data, your responsibilities will be to:

Act as a bridge between business and IT, responsible for requirement analysis and solution definition of dashboarding and reporting solutions using SAP BW/4HANA and Power Bi mostly, as well as Analysis for Office, SAP Analytics Cloud and Web Intelligence when need be
Help business in report and dashboard realization
Define and improve the data governance, especially when it comes to SAP tools usage
Define and improve documentation and data catalog
Share best practices and act as an evangelist to promote a data culture

You have the following experience:

At least 3 years of experience as SAP business analyst or a data analyst using SAP BW
Good understanding of SAP data model, with a focus on MM, SD, MDM, FI/CO, PS, QM, PP modules. Knowledge of SuccessFactor is an asset.
Strong experience with Power BI application and willingness to improve your knowledge of the tool
Experience migrating SAP BW to SAP BW/4HANA is an asset
Understanding of technical aspects of SAP BW is an asset (e.g. design of ETL and process chains, data modeling, query design, authorizations implementation)
Any certification in SAP data technologies (SAP BW, HANA, BO) is considered an asset

You are:

Customer oriented, with excellent listening and communication skills
Autonomous and eager to learn new technologies
Proactive and willing to share ideas to help the team grow
Fluent in French and English

Maybe this list sounds a bit too much? Relax, no one is a unicorn. Don’t hesitate to apply even if you don’t meet all criteria, awesomeness is a journey.
 Die Identität von IBA wird durch eine Gruppe von Kollegen geprägt, die durch Motivation, Neugierde, Kreativität, den Willen zum Lernen im täglichen Berufsleben, durch technische Herausforderungen und darüber hinaus einen hoch entwickelten Team- und Familiengeist angetrieben werden. Denn all dies zusammen macht das alltägliche Leben einfacher und unterhaltsamer.
  Wenn Sie Teil eines Teams aus etwa 40 Nationen werden und an einem der über 45 Standorte auf 3 Kontinenten arbeiten, bietet IBA Ihnen die Möglichkeit einer bedeutungsvollen Karriere mit direktem Einfluss auf den Kampf gegen Krebs.
 
 Wir werden angetrieben durch:
 

Entwicklung einer Umgebung, die durch modernste Technologie geprägt ist
Ausbau beruflicher und persönlicher Fertigkeiten durch praktisches Lernen, durch Teilnahme an herausfordernden Projekten und erstklassigen Fortbildungen
Persönliche Weiterentwicklung in einer freundlichen Kultur, die auf festen Werten basiert (DARE- CARE -SHARE- BE FAIR)
Autonom handeln und Teil von motivierten Teams mit guter Work-Life-Balance sein
An einem Unternehmen mitwirken, bei dem Nachhaltigkeit, Sicherheit und Wohlbefinden Standbeine unseres Erfolgs sind

 « IBA ist ein aufregendes und wachsendes Unternehmen mit einem einzigen Ziel vor Augen: Der Gesellschaft mit Partikeltechnologie dienen. Zusammen mit unseren Kunden und Partnern werden unsere Mitarbeiter durch die Mission des Unternehmens angetrieben und motiviert: Leben von Patienten schützen, verbessern und retten. Und das jeden Tag. » Olivier Legrain, CEO

Background We are looking for a Project Coordinator with basic Data Analyst skills. This position has a strong focus on project coordination tasks, as well as data analytics and reporting of related metrics and progress.
 Key Responsibilities include:

Coordination of data ownership assessment and identification activities with the project team and the business owners, via our IT-Service Delivery organization. Key activities are progress monitoring and tracking, reporting, task coordination
Hands-on assessment of metadata to identify patterns, which help to identify appropriate data owners
Maintain overview of orphan data structures and report on them to the project manager and sponsor
Build and maintain simple dashboards
Define a process to handle specific data access and permission requests and leverage these discussions in the data owner identification context
Document procedures, policies and standard methodologies related to all mentioned activities

Qualifications Required

2 - 5 years of project coordination experience
Work experience in global teams within large multinational matrix organizations is needed, as well as working in fully virtual teams
Experience in Health Care industry sector or other highly regulated industry (e.g. finance)
Proven expertise on Microsoft Teams, Word, PowerPoint and advanced Excel Spreadsheet knowledge

Preferred

PowerBI, basic SQL are an asset for this position
Basic knowledge on unstructured data management and file share concepts
Basic knowledge of Microsoft SharePoint
On-premises and cloud to cloud data migration experience

Other

Proven oral and verbal written communication skills in English

Ben je gepassioneerd door data en analyse? Heb je reeds ervaring binnen IT met data of business intelligence of met ERP systemen en ben je op zoek naar de volgende stap in je carrière? Of heb je ervaring als functioneel analist in de realisatie van rapportages en analyses? Kijk je daarnaast ook uit naar een persoonlijke omgeving in een dynamisch en gedreven team? #LI-EM2 
        

 Als functioneel analist of proxy fungeer je als de link tussen business en IT voor je klant en ondersteun je hen met je eigen expertise. Je bouwt een relatie op met je klant en je vertaalt hun wensen en noden. Je begrijpt de strategische doelen van een bedrijf en de waarde van data.
 De rapportage en analyse behoeften van de klant breng jij in kaart, en je hebt ervaring met het uitvoeren van analyses, testen en het werken met Agile methodes.
 In het projectteam ben jij dè vertegenwoordiger van de klant.
 Je bent samen met de scrum master/projectleider verantwoordelijk voor de voorbereiding en inplanning van user stories.
 Functionele vragen komen bij jou terecht als aanspreekpunt van het ontwikkelingsteam.
 Opvolging van de ontwikkeling en het testen van de functionaliteiten beschreven in de user stories.
 Beheer van de backlog en bewaking van het overzicht van de projectscope.
 Je geeft demo’s aan onze klanten.
 Je werkt vanuit de Cegeka vestigingen, je home office of bij de klant.
 Je werkt steeds aan verschillende unieke projecten in een no nonsens omgeving met een heel eigen aanpak.
















Wat breng jij mee?

Je bent een communicatieve teamplayer! 
Je hebt sterke affiniteit met data, business analytics en data governance. 
Kennisdeling, leergierigheid, gedrevenheid en flexibiliteit behoren tot je DNA. 
Je kan al terugkijken op een aantal jaren ervaring als functioneel analist 
Je hebt goede kennis van Microsoft Power BI en je bent in staat om voorbeeldrapporten te maken voor onze klanten 
ERP kennis is een sterk pluspunt 
Met jouw kritische blik kan je de zaken conceptueel uitdenken en voorstellen. 
Naar de klanten en naar het team toe, ben jij vlot in zowel mondelinge als schriftelijke communicatie. 
Je beschikt over een hoog verantwoordelijkheidsgevoel en bent in staat om opdrachten zelfstandig aan te pakken. 
Met oog voor risico’s en kwaliteit ga je resultaatsgericht te werk.















Wat hebben wij jou te bieden?





Teamwerk in een open en dynamische sfeer met ruimte voor nieuwe, frisse ideeën en initiatieven.
 Begeleiding op maat! Jij geeft aan waar je interesses liggen. We bieden verschillende carrièrepaden aan, en kijken samen hoe we je verder kunnen helpen ontplooien.
 Bijleren en kennisdeling staan centraal.






Naast het competitief brutosalaris, een (elektrische) bedrijfswagen of mobiliteitsbudget, maaltijdcheques, ecocheques groeps-en hospitalisatieverzekering, gsm-abonnement, forfaitaire onkostenvergoeding en krachtige laptop, bieden we jou flexibele werkuren en een mooie work/life balans.
 Dankzij ons Flex Reward Plan kunnen we een verloning op maat aanbieden.
 Je vaste werkplek is het Cegeka kantoor het dichtst bij je woonplaats, waarbij hybride werken ook mogelijk is.


















Aspire to more: onze belofte aan jou

         Je krijgt bij Cegeka alle ruimte om jezelf als professional verder te ontwikkelen. Samen realiseren we wat je écht wil betekenen voor onze klanten en collega’s. We nodigen je graag uit om met ons mee te groeien. In een ongekende veelzijdigheid aan uitdagende, betekenisvolle IT-projecten. Zet je stempel op projecten bij aansprekende klanten waarbij we het verschil maken. Aspire to more.
        

 We werken hier altijd met elkaar samen. Intensief, met veel plezier en betrokkenheid. Binnen een cultuur gedreven door familiewaarden: vol vertrouwen, mensgericht, open, loyaal en respectvol. Met veel vrijheid en verantwoordelijkheid. Kom deel uitmaken van de volgende fase van een trots, succesvol, snelgroeiend, innovatief, Europees IT-bedrijf vol ambities.

Job description
 As a Senior Data Scientist, you will need a combination of business focus, strong analytical and problem solving skills as well as programming experience to be able to analyse large data sets of information with the appropriate tools and techniques in order to deliver insightful and actionable information in an impactful manner. Your main mission will consist of working with our customers and understanding their business context.
  This unique role will engage you with the business by addressing strategic and tactical questions through the use of data mining and data visualization techniques, including pattern detection, graph analysis or statistical analysis. You’ll be challenged to propose innovative ways of addressing problems with alternative options and creative and workable solutions. You will also use the new visualisation tools to present your validated findings in a clear and precise manner to non-technical people.
  You will be exposed to different sectors and company functions. You will work most of the time at client sites in Belgium.
 
 This mission includes the following responsibilities that you will evolve into:
 


Participate or lead "advisory boards" or "dream sessions" at clients
Inspire clients, prospects and peers with your expertise
Develop relationship with senior management of the client (C-level and their N-1 level)
Manage post-delivery meeting with clients to discuss Keyrus added-value and project performance
Help more junior consultants to manage their client relationships effectively
Contributes to a value proposition 
Support sales, senior managers and directors in pre-sales meetings
(Pro)Actively looking for new solutions or partners to extend our ecosystem.
Able to lead a proposal process end-to-end and be responsible for the completion with a correct pricing, planning and staffing
Take ownership & define go-to-market of a value proposition
Able to prepare strategic roadmaps (commercially, partnership evolution, product evolution, services, solutions, evaluations and trainings) outlining the direction that Keyrus should take 
Take the lead in developing and promoting a new business domain / service offering


 Profile

Minimum 7 years relevant years of experience
Master or PhD in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, Engineering, Operations Research or any related field
Passionate about data and/or statistical analysis, with mathematics and causal modelling skills
Strong programming skills such as Java and/or Python
Knowledge of statistical modelling and data mining is required
Knowledge of machine learning, Hadoop or other Big Data frameworks is a plus
At ease in manipulating and analysing complex, high-volume, high-dimensionality data from various sources
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills: you have the ability to communicate results clearly to non-technical colleagues
Strong analytical competencies and excellent creative problem-solving skills
Experience in Data Visualisation (knowledge of Business Intelligence Reporting & Analysis tools)
Overall knowledge of Business Intelligence is an asset
Fluent in Dutch and/or French and English

 What we offer
 Keyrus offers a working environment and projects that attract the best people working in Data, Digital and Business Transformation. Working on diverse and challenging projects, you will have the opportunity to develop multi-disciplinary skills to help you build a strong career path.
 To support you in this we have a digital learning platform with access to over 30,000 training courses as well as courses created by our experts. We dedicate a generous training budget that allows you to manage your career path at a pace that suits you.
 We have also implemented an Agile Performance Management framework, where strength-based coaching, aligned company goals, alongside regular check-ins and feedback managed throughout the year are at the heart of our people management strategy.
 Our salary package is generous and includes ‘’Innovation Income Deduction’’ which recognises Keyrus and, in turn, our employees for the creation of innovative solutions and Intellectual Property. This means a greater net salary for you. On top of this we offer a car, petrol card, DKV insurance, net allowances and a cafeteria plan, amongst other benefits!
 Keyrus gives you the chance to develop your career alongside leaders in data, digital and management and transformation. Our project and clients at the heart of data and digital transformation changing the world we live in for the better, making data matter.

 Who we are
 Keyrus, creator of value in the era of Data and Digital.
 Keyrus is dedicated to helping enterprises take advantage of the Data and Digital paradigm to enhance their performance, facilitating and accelerating their transformation, and generating new drivers of growth, competitiveness, and sustainability.
 Keyrus in Belgium employs 200 highly skilled consultants and is part of the international Keyrus Group, an international player in consulting and technologies and a specialist in Data and Digital. Created in 1996, listed on Euronext's Eurolist, with consolidated revenues of €289.1m in 2021 and with more than 3200 employees in 22 countries, the Keyrus Group offers the performance, solidity and know-how of a large professional services organisation, whilst preserving the agility of a young company.

Are you looking for a challenging job in which you will be using innovative and cutting-edge technologies? Are you fascinated by the incredible and infinite possibilities of the digital world? Then you are the one we are looking for to join our team as a Data Analyst.
In this role, you are the expert during presales and take the lead during projects. In presales phase you will help translating business challenges from our customers into a viable data driven approach. In our customer projects you will take the lead to generate valuable insights from structured or unstructured data in a team with professionals from the customer and our business partners.
Joining our MicroEnterprise Digital Transformation Services (DXS) Consulting & Project Services team which covers Artificial Intelligence (AI), Blockchain and Data Analytics, you would work specifically on projects related to Data Analytics and advanced analytics.
We are looking for someone who is passionate about new technologies and has a desire to transform the way people do business. The goal is to allow our customers taking decision based on real-time, factual insights.
Some of your responsibilities: 

Identifying business challenges from the business operations, analyzing, and selecting the best approach and methodology for solving these challenges including the use of data & Business Intelligence platforms 
Extracting and cleaning data from primary and secondary sources 
Reorganizing data in a readable format 
Performing analysis to assess quality and meaning of data
Performing descriptive and explorative analysis using statistical tools to identify, analyze, and interpret patterns and trends in complex data sets that could be helpful for the diagnosis and prediction
Describing and visualizing discovered insights and communicate results to a business audience in MVP’s and POC phase
Outlining the components, time, and scope of the project in the scale-up phase
Researching and developing opportunities in the data arena
You have a direct impact on the growth of our Micro Enterprise (support in hiring, commercial activities, …).



This job brings a lot of freedom and entrepreneurship and offers you the opportunity to proactively bring creative ideas and new services offerings to our clients and really contribute to the growth of the DXS Micro Enterprise! In short, this is an exciting opportunity for professionals who like translating business challenges into successful solutions while making excellent use of given data. Join us if you like to work in an environment where growth and digital transformation are the essence!


What is in it for you? When you join our team, we offer you an attractive salary and secondary benefits, including a variable bonus scheme and the possibility to obtain a company car. You will get the opportunity to work in a flexible environment with lots of training possibilities and the opportunity to build your career internationally.

1 - Werken bij de VUB


 De Vrije Universiteit Brussel staat al meer dan 50 jaar voor vrijheid, gelijk(waardig)heid en verbondenheid en dat leeft sterk op onze campussen bij zowel studenten als personeel. Bij de VUB vind je een diverse verzameling aan persoonlijkheden: innovators pur sang, maar vooral mensen die 100% hun authentieke zelf zijn. Met zo’n 3500 medewerkers zijn we de grootste Nederlandstalige werkgever, in de privésector, in Brussel; een internationale stad waarmee we ons maar al te graag verbinden en waar(rond) onze 4 campussen gelegen zijn.


Ons onderwijs en onderzoek zijn gegrond op het beginsel van vrij onderzoek met het oog op de vooruitgang van de mensheid. We verwerpen elk louter gezagsargument en waarborgen de vrije oordeelsvorming die nodig is voor de maatschappelijke inschakeling van dit basisbeginsel.


De VUB is autonoom en wordt democratisch beheerd. Daarmee waarborgen we het uitoefenen van de fundamentele vrijheden binnen onze universiteit, maar ook het recht van de Universitaire Gemeenschap om deel uit te maken van het beleid van de Universiteit en de controle hierop.


Tot de zending van de Universiteit behoren:

het ontwikkelen, het overbrengen en het toepassen van een hoogstaand academisch onderwijs en wetenschappelijk onderzoek, vrij van elk vooroordeel;
de maatschappelijke inschakeling hiervan in een geest van sociale bewogenheid;
de kritische vorming van iedereen in het licht van de in de gemeenschap te dragen verantwoordelijkheid.





2 - Functie


 Momenteel zijn we voor de Onderzoeksbursalen van de Faculteit Geneeskunde en Farmacie, vakgroep Gezondheidswetenschappen, op zoek naar een doctoraatsbursaal.


Meer concreet zal je takenpakket, ter voorbereiding van een doctoraat, er als volgt uitzien:



Context:
De kennis over de populatie van kinderen en jongeren met traumatisch hersenletsel en hun zorgtraject is tot op vandaag zeer beperkt. Knelpunten zijn de relatief kleine aantallen personen die bij dergelijk onderzoek worden geïncludeerd en de haalbaarheid van opvolging over verschillende zorgverstrekkers doorheen de tijd. De grote hoeveelheid aan nationale data over klinische gegevens en zorggebruik die routinematig door de overheid en de ziekteverzekering verzameld wordt, biedt belangrijke mogelijkheden om aan beide problemen tegemoet te komen. Analyse van deze gekoppelde data biedt ons de kans om meer inzicht te verwerven over de populatie van kinderen en jongeren met traumatisch hersenletsel, de zorgtrajecten van deze doelgroep en de barrières en faciliterende factoren van een adequate zorg. De bevindingen die hieruit volgen zullen gebruikt worden voor het formuleren van actiepunten voor het zorgbeleid om de zorg voor kinderen en jongeren met traumatisch hersenletsel te verbeteren.


In dit onderzoeksproject word je methodologisch begeleid door een interdisciplinair team van experten, en wordt veel aandacht besteed aan het contact met het werkveld (zowel patiënten en hun ouders, zorgverleners als beleidsmakers). Naast domeinspecifieke kennis, wordt ook ervaring opgedaan met datamanagement en –analyse in de gezondheidszorg in het algemeen, wat een belangrijke troef is in de maatschappij van vandaag.


Opdracht en voornaamste taken:


Kwalitatief (bijv. semi-gestructureerde interviews met zorgverleners en (ouders van) traumapatiënten) en kwantitatief onderzoek verrichten (incidentie van types traumatische hersenletsels bij kinderen/jongeren, analyses naar types van zorgtrajecten, scenario-analyses van kwaliteitsverbetering in zorg bij deze doelgroep etc).


Schrijven van wetenschappelijke artikels in het kader van een doctoraat.


Presenteren van uw onderzoek op nationale en internationale congressen.


Deelnemen aan activiteiten georganiseerd door de Doctoral School Life Sciences and Medicine (seminaries/workshops/training).




 
Voor deze functie zal onze Brussels Health Campus (Jette) je thuisbasis worden.




 3 - Profiel


 Wat verwachten wij van jou?



Je beschikt over een masterdiploma in een (para)medische, sociale of economische richting.


 


Je hebt interesse in zorg en revalidatie.
Je bent analytisch ingesteld, en hebt affiniteit met kwantitatieve analyse (ervaring met R/Mathlab is een meerwaarde).
Je beschikt over goede communicatievaardigheden (schriftelijk en mondeling), in het Nederlands en het Engels.
Je kan vlot samenwerken met partners uit verschillende disciplines





Je hebt geen werkzaamheden verricht in het kader van een mandaat als assistent bezoldigd ten laste van de werkingsmiddelen, gedurende meer dan 12 maanden (gecumuleerd).





4 - Aanbod


 Word jij onze nieuwe collega?


Dan bieden we je een voltijdse doctoraatsbeurs aan, voor de duur van 12 maanden (verlengbaar tot max. 48 maanden, mits positieve evaluatie van de doctoraatswerkzaamheden), met voorziene startdatum 01-10-2022.


Je ontvangt een beursbedrag gekoppeld aan een van de barema’s die door de overheid worden vastgelegd.


OPGELET: De effectieve uitwerking van de doctoraatsbeurs is onderworpen aan de opschortende voorwaarde van jouw inschrijving als doctoraatsstudent aan de universiteit.


Bij de VUB garanderen we een open, betrokken en diverse werkplek en bieden we je kansen om je carrière (verder) uit te bouwen.


Daarnaast geniet je van voordelen als:

Maximale terugbetaling woon-werkverkeer met het openbaar vervoer of een fietsvergoeding;
Een kosteloze hospitalisatieverzekering;
De ruimte om je job-inhoud mee te vormen en voortdurend bij te leren via VUB LRN;
Voordelige sportmogelijkheden;
Ecocheques;
Heerlijke maaltijden in onze campusrestaurants aan een aantrekkelijk tarief;
Een open en familiale werkomgeving met aandacht voor je work-life balance én een uitzonderlijke verlofregeling met 35 verlofdagen (bij voltijdse tewerkstelling).





5 - Geïnteresseerd?


 Spreekt deze functie je aan?


Bezorg ons dan ONLINE en ten laatste op 06-09-2022 je motivatiebrief, met inbegrip van een toelichting over de uitbouw van je toekomstig onderzoek, je curriculum vitae en je diploma’s (niet van toepassing voor VUB-alumni).


Referenties kunnen opgevraagd worden als deel van de procedure.   De sollicitatiegesprekken zijn voorzien op 09 september 2022. 
Heb je vragen over deze functie? Contacteer dan Koen Putman via koen.putman@vub.be of 02/4774740.


Wil je graag weten hoe het is om te werken bij de VUB? Ga dan naar jobs.vub.be en ontdek alles over o.a. onze campussen, voordelen, strategische doelen en collega’s.

job_title: Junior Data & Analytics Consultant - Brussels (sector focus:...
job_summary:
Are you passionate about delivering business value out of data, leveraging Big Data and Advanced Analytics technics and technologies (e.g. Machine learning, Artificial Intelligence)? Would you like to help our clients in Financial Services in solving their most complex and large-scale Data & Analytics challenges?

 At EY, we have a strong and dynamic Data & Analytics business practice, made of passionate, motivated and dedicated professionals who work closely with colleagues from other departments, in domains such as risk management, business optimization, digital transformation and customer experience, to deliver high value and tangible results to our clients.

 As a future Data & Analytics Consultant, you will help our clients in the following domains:
 

Reporting, business intelligence and data science models embedded in core business processes and applications
 Assessment and improvement of the company’s data capabilities (data strategy, data governance, data quality, data architecture, data management, data usage)
 Design and delivery of modern(ized) data architectures, data warehousing, data integration or data migration.
 Your key responsibilities
 You will learn all you need to know about the different Data & Analytics topics (i.e.: reporting, BI, data science, data strategy, etc.)
 You collect and analyze business and IT requirements in scope of the delivery lifecycle of our Data & Analytics projects
 You contribute to the setup and implementation of the “data-driven” roles and responsibilities, policies and processes within our clients’ organization in line with their data strategy, their maturity and their company culture
 You participate to the design and improvement of components of a target data architecture: enterprise data model, data profiling, data integrity controls, data integration flows, setup of new (big) data technology, data migration plan and execution
 You collaborate with experienced data engineers and Business Intelligence experts to deliver modern data platforms (data warehouses, data lakes, etc.)

 As a Data Scientist Modeling & Optimization, you are passionate about using data and analytical models to direct decision making and solve complex challenges. You develop the control software for the next generation of autonomous robotics and swarms of intelligent drones.
 Key responsibilities


Design the next generation algorithms to improve robotic decision making, trajectory optimization and world mapping
Use machine/deep learning algorithms to build up world models of the environment around the robots
Translate the practical control/navigation/mapping problems into optimization problems with concrete objectives and constraints; Solving these optimization problems by choosing the optimal solvers

Work closely with the research team and project manager
Take ownership of research projects and reporting
Be the expert in the dotOcean team

Bring ideas to the table and set up proof of concepts to demonstrate cutting-edge research concepts

Industrial and/or academic expertise in defining and solving optimisation problems

Programming experience in one or more of the following languages: Python and/or C/C++

Ability to design and execute on research agenda

Proactive work ethic and strong communication skills to ensure your research is understood and implemented in the best possible way.
Able to guide architectural & technical discussions and you ensure the bigger picture is never lost during a technical deep dive
Always eager to learn and develop yourself further
Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
Strong problem-solving skills, intelligence, and initiative

dotOcean stands for innovation, entrepreneurship and the latest technologies and evolutions on automation in the growing maritime and defense industry

 #BePartOfSomethingGreat!

Please submit your CV in English

 All applications will be treated as strictly confidential.

Company Description


 Veolia group aims to be the benchmark company for ecological transformation. With nearly 179,000 employees worldwide, the Group designs and provides game-changing solutions that are both useful and practical for water, waste and energy management. Through its three complementary business activities, Veolia helps to develop access to resources, preserve available resources, and replenish them.
 In 2020, the Veolia group supplied 95 million people with drinking water and 62 million people with wastewater service, produced nearly 43 million megawatt hours of energy and treated 47 million metric tons of waste. Veolia Environnement (listed on Paris Euronext: VIE) recorded consolidated revenue of €26.010 billion in 2020.Veolia Energy
 Flexcity, owned by VEOLIA, is a technological scale up company working in the energy sector on Demand Side Management (DSM) as an aggregator. We are active in Belgium, France, Netherlands, Italy and Spain and entering new countries. The concerned position aims at reinforcing Flexcity’s operational support to customers and colleagues in all countries.
 Flexcity is looking for a Market Data Analyst




 Job Description


 Flexcity is looking for a Demand response market analyst. You will join a dynamic team that is committed to the energy transition, and in which you will immediately be given your own responsibilities. On the basis of the technical data that you will receive and taking into account the current market conditions, you will calculate the flexible power potential of industrial customers. You will use vast databases to build tools that help us improve the optimisation of Flexible Power.
 Description of the responsibilities:

 Assist product Manager in development of new products and business cases.
 Use technical data to identify flexible power potential industrial customers
 Leverage data in Flexcity’s databases in order to improve our optimisations
 Perform market screenings on emerging technologies such as EVs and E-boilers
 Build data gathering pipelines 





 Qualifications



 Educational background: Engineer, ICT, Data Science, Mathematics
 Previous experience: -
 Skills: Programming skill required (no specific language)
 Languages: English required, other languages are a plus
 Other: Eagerness to learn and profound interest in Energy Markets

 Type of contract : VIE
 Length : 12 months, can be extended to 24
 Location: Brussels, Belgium
 #weareresourcers




 Additional Information


 Toutes vos informations demeureront confidentielles en vertu des directives sur l'égalité d'accès à l'emploi.

 As an inclusive company, Veolia is committed to diversity and gives equal consideration to all applications, without discrimination.

Louvain-La-Neuve
, 
Belgium
 







CluePoints is an innovative, fast-growing company and the premier provider of Risk-Based Monitoring and Data Quality Oversight solutions to clinical research organizations. Our products enable both risk planning and operational risk monitoring, and utilize advanced statistical algorithms to determine the quality of clinical trial data both during and following study execution. CluePoints is seeking outstanding candidates with strong data analytics aptitude and a passion for delivery excellence, to help drive customer success and broad adoption of the CluePoints solution.
 Please apply only if you hold a valid work permit or if you are a national of the Member States of the European Economic Area.

 Responsibilities


 Perform the technical configuration of the CluePoints solution for clinical studies based on customer requirements

 Perform analyses using the CluePoints Central Monitoring Platform – diagnosing and explaining anomalies identified in the clinical study data

 Summarize findings and support the communication of results to customers (both written report and oral presentation)

 Participate in the continuous improvement and development of our product solutions and operational processes

 Provide consultation and related operational support to customers as needed, with the help of more senior Data Analysts and/or the CluePoints Project Lead

 Ensure that appropriate documentation is produced and maintained for each study Lead

 Assist Business Development and Quality Assurance teams in responding to client questions and requests (e.g., RFP responses, audits, etc.)

 Skills Needed


 Experience with one or more programming languages, and preferably with statistical programming (strong preference for SAS)

 Aptitude for data analytics

 Aptitude for mathematical and statistical concepts

 Excellent English oral and written communication skills

 Experience and ability to work well in a team environment

 Ability to thrive in a fast-moving environment, under time and resource constraints

 High degree of accuracy and attention to detail

 Experience with and understanding of clinical trials and clinical data is a plus

 Experience with CDISC databases is a plus


 Qualifications Needed


 College degree, preferably in a scientific or technical discipline

 0-2 years of experience in a clinical research environment.




 Top Reasons to Work with Us





 A challenging and rewarding job in an ambitious startup
 Work for a fast-growing, multi-disciplinary and international team
 Competitive salary
 Geek & Startup atmosphere
 Want to work sometimes from home or work different hours? We can work something out!
 Flat hierarchy
 We offer some perks: free drinks, cookies, fruits, etc…

Overview: 
 
 Data Analyst



 We are looking for a Data Analyst to pick up and deliver new data driven cases by analysing the requirements and data involved.
 

 The goal of the project is to build a new IT Data Lake on AWS with IT related data feeds, both batch and online and the exploitation of that data with automated reports and AI cases to support the IT organization and its processes.

 What skills do you need to meet the requirements of our team?




You are capable to define qualitative data selections queries based upon the requirements



 You are used to join in with the feasibility study to determine what data the company need, define the work to be done and by whom



 You will be the guard quality of the data and verify the integrity, think ahead to define possible issues



 You have a good knowledge of GDPR and how to deal with it in a data driven context


 What functions will help you advance?


 You have at least 3 year experience in (big) Data Projects
 You have data analysis, data definitions and data modelling skills
 You have knowledge of the Agile method with Safe
 You have a strong written and verbal communication, who can listen and understand
 You are a real team player: who like helping and coaching
